Text:
Resident Evil 6 Update 4 (c) Capcom

      04/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
            - :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure


NEW FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Added new options to the session search function
- Improved SLI performance with NVIDIA graphics cards

A number of other issues have also been fixed.


1. Unrar.
2. Install the Update. No other updates are needed for this release.
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory to your
  game install directory.
4. Play the game.
5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

@YarinRub wherever you see "saving..." then game has been saved not checkpoint which is for continue after die

To fix Mercenaries mode issues follow the Tunngle guide, just search Resident Evil 6 Tunngle, not only does it fix mercenaries but it enables you to play the game online too
